wikipedia.title: Juju
wikipedia.extract: Juju or ju-ju (French: joujou, lit. 'plaything') is a spiritual belief system incorporating objects, such as amulets, and spells used in religious practice, as part of witchcraft in West Africa especially the people of Nigeria. The term has been applied to traditional African religions.In a general sense the term "juju" can be used to refer to magical properties dealing with good luck.
